reviews.review_msg: Paul is an engaging and articulate speaker with obvious interest in the course material. Great.

Defines the word eccentric. Has a nervous sweatiness that is difficult to watch.  Lectures are boring, vague, obscure. Gives many personal anecdotes, half of which he admits are not true, and furthermore fails to relate them in any coherent way to the subject matter. But he IS an easy marker!
I found this prof to be very rude, unhelpful and generally unknowledgeable. It's a shame when professors think they are so much better than their students and peers.
Karyn is a very smart and engaging prof; however, she is very very picky about the mechanics of writing.. very picky..
